Klay Thompson

\n\t\n\n \n\n \n\n \n

\n \n Klay Alexander Thompson\n \n \n ▪\n Twitter:\n KlayThompson\n \n

\n\n\n\n\n

\n(Big Smokey)\n

\n \n\n\n\n \n

\n \n Position:\n \n Shooting Guard\n\n\n \n ▪\n \n \n Shoots:\n \n Right\n

\n\n\n

6-7, 215lb (201cm, 97kg)

\n\n \n

Team: Golden State Warriors

\n \n\n \n

\n Born:\n \n February 8,\n 1990\n \n \n in Los Angeles, California\n us\n

\n\n \n\n \n\n

Relatives: Brother Mychel Thompson; Father Mychal Thompson

\n \n

\n \n \n College:\n \n \n \n Washington State University\n \n

\n\n\n \n\n \n

\n \n Recruiting Rank:\n \n 2008 (58)\n

\n\n\n \n

\n \n Draft:\n \n Golden State Warriors, 1st round (11th pick, 11th overall), 2011 NBA Draft\n

\n\n\n \n

\n NBA Debut: December 25, 2011\n

\n\n\n \n\n \n

\n \n Experience:\n \n 6 years\n

\n\n\n\n \n\n \n\n \n\n \n\n\n\n \n\n\n\n\n

Klay Thompson

\n\t\n\n \n\n \n\n \n

\n \n Klay Alexander Thompson\n \n \n ▪\n Twitter:\n KlayThompson\n \n

\n\n\n\n\n

\n(Big Smokey)\n

\n \n\n\n\n \n

\n \n Position:\n \n Shooting Guard\n\n\n \n ▪\n \n \n Shoots:\n \n Right\n

\n\n\n

6-7, 215lb (201cm, 97kg)

\n\n \n

Team: Golden State Warriors

\n \n\n \n

\n Born:\n \n February 8,\n 1990\n \n \n in Los Angeles, California\n us\n

\n\n \n\n \n\n

Relatives: Brother Mychel Thompson; Father Mychal Thompson

\n \n

\n \n \n College:\n \n \n \n Washington State University\n \n

\n\n\n \n\n \n

\n \n Recruiting Rank:\n \n 2008 (58)\n

\n\n\n \n

\n \n Draft:\n \n Golden State Warriors, 1st round (11th pick, 11th overall), 2011 NBA Draft\n

\n\n\n \n

\n NBA Debut: December 25, 2011\n

\n\n\n \n\n \n

\n \n Experience:\n \n 6 years\n

\n\n\n\n \n\n \n\n \n\n \n\n\n\n \n\n\n\n\n

Klay Thompson

\n\t\n\n \n\n \n\n \n

\n \n Klay Alexander Thompson\n \n \n ▪\n Twitter:\n KlayThompson\n \n

\n\n\n\n\n

\n(Big Smokey)\n

\n \n\n\n\n \n

\n \n Position:\n \n Shooting Guard\n\n\n \n ▪\n \n \n Shoots:\n \n Right\n

\n\n\n

6-7, 215lb (201cm, 97kg)

\n\n \n

Team: Golden State Warriors

\n \n\n \n

\n Born:\n \n February 8,\n 1990\n \n \n in Los Angeles, California\n us\n

\n\n \n\n \n\n

Relatives: Brother Mychel Thompson; Father Mychal Thompson

\n \n

\n \n \n College:\n \n \n \n Washington State University\n \n

\n\n\n \n\n \n

\n \n Recruiting Rank:\n \n 2008 (58)\n

\n\n\n \n

\n \n Draft:\n \n Golden State Warriors, 1st round (11th pick, 11th overall), 2011 NBA Draft\n

\n\n\n \n

\n NBA Debut: December 25, 2011\n

\n\n\n \n\n \n

\n \n Experience:\n \n 6 years\n
